alert.note: Alert for Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Todd County through 1030 PM CDT... At 929 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grass Mountain, or 18 miles southwest of Mission, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and up to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rosebud, Saint Francis and Two Strike around 940 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lakeview, Sicangu Village and Littleburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
